model.name: Appearing Letters Blouson
model.disambiguatingDescription: This technical piece gives a unique twist to the season's LV Letters theme. When its water-resistant cotton comes into contact with water, an inspirational quote from Virgil Abloh appears in all-over lettering on the fabric. Cut in a regular fit, the blouson features zipped removable half-sleeves, a T-chain puller, a tonal lining and a silicon LV signature on the pocket.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Cotton
  • Khaki
  • Regular Fit
  • Model measurements : chest 33.5’’ / 85 cm, height 6'3’’ / 190 cm
  • Model wears a FR 48 size
  • Made in Italy
